int msgBufReadRegister ( int  reg  ) 

Read the value of a register from the register buffer.

Originally, registers were 8 bit wide, but in the implementation of the message buffer interface in the DCS board firmware the addressing was 32 bit wide. Thats why register numbers correspond to register addresses = 4*regNo.

Parameters:
reg # of register
Returns:
8 bit value of the register

Definition at line 2078 of file dcscMsgBufferInterface.c.

References GENERAL_CTRL_REG_ADDR, and readDcscRegister().

Referenced by execRegReadCmd().

Here is the call graph for this function:

int msgBufWriteRegister ( int  reg,
unsigned char  value 
)

Write an 8 bit value to a register of the register buffer.

The same as in msgBufReadRegister applies for the register addressing.

Parameters:
reg # of register
value 8 bit value to write
Returns:
8 bit value of the register after write
